import React from "react"; function ClassTable({ classes, onEdit, onDelete }) { return ( {Array.isArray(classes) && classes.map((cls) => ( ))}
Grade Fee Teacher Subjects Timetable Actions
{cls.grade} {cls.fee} {cls.teacher ? cls.teacher.name : ""} {cls.subjects ? cls.subjects.map((s) => s.name).join(", ") : ""} {cls.timetable}
); } export default ClassTable;
